Title: Slaughterhouse
Plot: After the murder of his friend, Raylan is a man on fire as he goes after any- and everyone he holds responsible on the way to a bloody final showdown.
GuestStars: Raymond J. Barry, Jere Burns, Adam Arkin, Jim Beaver, Demetrius Grosse, David Meunier, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, David Carpenter, Cleavon McClendon, Abby Miller, Tyler Neitzel, Mykelti Williamson, Neal McDonough
